attributes.action: Ban Muslim Woman Veil in Public Places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I hope the labour gov't would start a debate on Muslim woman veil in public places like schools and hospitals.  To follow France foot step towards the ban.
Muslim Veil is not welcome in Britain !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
